snippet: A court says it can rule in a case against Facebook over suspending a user’s account over a link to a documentary on a Courbet painting, “The Origin of the World.”
abstract: A court says it can rule in a case against Facebook over suspending a user’s account over a link to a documentary on a Courbet painting, “The Origin of the World.”

headline.main: French Court Rules It Has Jurisdiction Over Facebook in Nude Painting Case
